stimulusHtml: Suppose that  fr  is a properly instantiated reference to a  Fraction  object. Which of the following best describes the conditions under which the call  fr.getDecimal()  will fail to return a value?

features.html:
Consider the following class definition.

 

public class Fraction
{
   private int numerator;
   private int denominator;
   
   public Fraction(int n, int d)
   {
      numerator = n;
      denominator = d;
   }
   
   double getDecimal()
   {
      return (double) numerator / denominator;
   }
}

choicesHtml: When the instance variables  numerator  and  denominator  have the same value
When the instance variables  numerator  and  denominator  have different values
When the instance variable  denominator  is equal to  0
When the instance variable  denominator  is negative
